GLOWTAG_DESCRIPTION: With this command you can assign a tag to your Glow. In order to create a Glow tag use the "{{prefix}}glowtagcreate" command
GLOWTAGS_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} You don't have a **Glow** tag yet. You can create them with the command: `{{prefix}}gtc <Name> <Emoji>`
GLOW_TAG_INVALID: {{author}} You dont have any **Glow** tag with the name `{{tagname}}`
INVALID_GLOW_SINGULAR: {{author}} The **Glow** code you provided is either invalid or not in your inventory
INVALID_GLOW_CODE: {{author}} At least one of the **Glow** codes you provided is either invalid or not in your inventory
SUCCESSFUL_MULTIPLE_GLOWTAG: {{author}} All selected **Glows** were successfully tagged as `{{tag}}`
